abstract: Army officials report deaths of four crew members in crash of Black Hawk helicopter during training exercise at Fort Hood, Tex.
lead_paragraph: Four people were killed Monday after their Black Hawk helicopter crashed during a training exercise in Texas, Army officials said

headline.main: Crash Kills 4 on Helicopter at Fort Hood
headline.print_headline: Crash Kills 4 on Helicopter at Fort Hood
